name: associazione italiana delle bioplastiche e dei materiali biodegradabili e compostabili
goal:
To promote the development of the use of bioplastics in packaging, agricolture and other uses, through education, information, formation, events and newsletters etc.
The Association also works through the legislative process to promote the use of bioplastics and to ensure the application of European packaging standards, in particular EN 13432.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Food Safety, Single market
euInitiatives: Directive for the reduction of use of plastic mono-use shopping bags in the EU. Circular Economy Package: EU Action Plan for the Circular Economy.
